text: Andrea Nannini (12 December 1944 - 1 March 2021) was an Italian volleyball player. He was part of the Italian teams that won the 1970 Summer Universiade and finished in eighth place at the 1976 Summer Olympics. Nannini was born in Modena, Italy. Nannini died on 1 March 2021, aged 76. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian volleyball players Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Emilia-Romagna
title: Andrea Nannini
